title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2814.2 - Program reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2814.2 - Program reports

State Regulations

Program reports detailing the accomplishments of housing
preservation and community renewal activities shall accompany financial reports
submitted to the division six weeks after the completion of each of the first
three quarters. Each report shall be cumulative. The annual program report
shall be submitted in lieu of the fourth program quarterly
report. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2814.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
